text: The Pale Emperor is the ninth studio album by American rock band, Marilyn Manson. The Pale Emperor was released on January 15, 2015 through Hell, etc.. Manson dedicated the album to his late mother, Barbara Warner, who died on May 13, 2014 after an eight-year battle with Alzheimer's disease and dementia. The album peaked at #8 on the Billboard 200, #6 on the Top Album Sales, #3 on the Top Rock Albums, #3 on the Top Alternative Albums, and at #1 on the Top Hard Rock Albums. ==Songs== ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Marilyn Manson albums
title: The Pale Emperor
